availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Bourbon County, Kentucky, resident. Bourbon County native. Son of James Hutchcraft and Eliza Hutchcraft. Married to Susan C. Crofton Hutchcraft in Clark County, Kentucky, on January 13, 1857. Father of Hannah Hutchcraft and James P. Hutchcraft. Farmer in Marion, Iowa, in 1860. Resident in Bourbon County in 1850.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bourbon County, District 1, p. 278B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Iowa, Lee County, Marion, p. 104.
